mapper.select: select lc.id as id,lc.content as content,us.user_name as userName,lc.title as title, mv.img_url as movieUrl,lc.filter_content as filterContent,lc.pure_text as pureContent, ui.header_url as userUrl,lc.score as score,lc.create_time as time from long_commentary lc inner join movie mv on lc.movie_id = mv.id inner join users us on lc.user_id = us.id inner join user_info ui on lc.user_id = ui.user_id where lc.state = 0 order by lc.create_time desc

select lc.id as id,lc.content as content,us.user_name as userName,lc.title as title, mv.img_url as movieUrl,lc.filter_content as filterContent,lc.pure_text as pureContent, ui.header_url as userUrl,lc.score as score,lc.create_time as time from long_commentary lc inner join movie mv on lc.movie_id = mv.id inner join collections co on co.commentary_id = lc.id inner join users us on co.user_id = us.id inner join user_info ui on co.user_id = ui.user_id where co.user_id = #{id} and lc.state = 0

select lc.id as id,lc.content as content,us.user_name as userName,lc.title as title, mv.img_url as movieUrl,lc.filter_content as filterContent,lc.pure_text as pureContent, ui.header_url as userUrl,lc.score as score,lc.create_time as time from long_commentary lc inner join movie mv on lc.movie_id = mv.id inner join users us on lc.user_id = us.id inner join user_info ui on lc.user_id = ui.user_id where lc.id = #{id} and lc.state = 0

select lc.id as id,lc.content as content,us.user_name as userName,lc.title as title, mv.img_url as movieUrl,lc.filter_content as filterContent,lc.pure_text as pureContent, ui.header_url as userUrl,lc.score as score,lc.create_time as time from long_commentary lc inner join movie mv on lc.movie_id = mv.id inner join users us on lc.user_id = us.id inner join user_info ui on lc.user_id = ui.user_id where lc.state = 0 and lc.type = #{type}
and mv.name like concat(concat('%',#{movieName}),'%')
and us.user_name like concat(concat('%',#{userName}),'%')
and lc.title like concat(concat('%',#{commentaryName}),'%')
and lc.id in ( select lc.id from long_commentary lc inner join movie mv on lc.movie_id = mv.id where lc.title like concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') or mv.name like concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') )

select avg(table1.score) as score, table1.movieId as id from (select score as score, movieId as movieId from short_commentary union select score as score, movie_id as movieId from long_commentary) as table1 group by table1.movieId;
